This game was my main source of entertainment in my dark days of childhood. It was my only escape from family problems till my dad got rid of my PC and i wasn't able to play. I remember my childhood friend Andy gifted me this game back then on a usb and we would play all the time. Thank you for giving me good memories in dark times.
